summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; authorizing the Mayor to execute agreements for financial assistance for the N.E. 45th St. UAB Signal Improvement project, the West Denny Way/Denny Way UAB Signal Improvement project, the East Roanoke/10th Avenue E. UAB Paving project and the N.E. 50th St. UAB Signal Improvement project; accepting the money when received, authorizing the hiring of consultants; and making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and Arterial City St. Funds.
